org.deidentifier.arx.masking

Class ConstantShiftDateMasker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.masking.AbstractDictionaryMasker<T>
      • org.deidentifier.arx.masking.AbstractInstBasedDictMasker<java.util.Date>
        • org.deidentifier.arx.masking.ConstantShiftDateMasker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDictionaryMasker<java.util.Date>, IInstanceMasker<java.util.Date>

    public class ConstantShiftDateMasker
extends AbstractInstBasedDictMasker<java.util.Date>
    Masks date instances by adding a constant time period.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConstantShiftDateMasker(int shiftDistance)
      Creates a constant shift masker that shifts the input date by the specified amount of time.
      ConstantShiftDateMasker(org.joda.time.ReadablePeriod shiftPeriod)
      Creates a constant shift masker that shifts the input by the given period of time.
